name: 2023-05-09-01---secret-plus
description: - This project is inspired primarily by my Udemy course on Web Development     - [The Complete 2023 Web Development Bootcamp](https://www.udemy.com/course/the-complete-web-development-bootcamp/) by Angela Yu     - It’s a phenomenal course that has gotten me well past some very essential fundamentals in web dev - In the course, there’s Section 37, which is all about **Authentication & Security** - This project is the end-product of this section, where I studied the topic and code an example project out of it after - I fully expect to have a fully-functioning web application built and live after this section in the course
